b7958f75-f4ae-43e5-83d0-83d3fa6c6f95.answer: "Moving from planning to actually launching is rough‚Äîfeels like constant work, just starting over with tweaks. Sometimes you gotta release things even if they're not quite right and accept they'll never be exactly what you imagined."

it's a bit slower, sure, but it makes way fewer mistakes and can usually one-shot almost anything i throw at it
82c6e871-f2ee-4439-8976-202251d0f9d5.answer: it‚Äôs a definite step up, i‚Äôve been wrestling with generating complex prompts for image gen lately, and how well it understands is a huge help, even if it takes a breath longer to process. the reduced hallucination alone is worth the wait.
